polar|equipment|equipmentcode: A VARCHAR(50) primary key uniquely identifying each equipment record.
polar|equipment|equipmenttype: An enum (EquipmentType_enum) specifying the category of equipment (e.g., Shelter, Scientific, Safety, Vehicle, Generator, Communication).
polar|equipment|equipmentmodel: A VARCHAR(80) describing the model name/number of the equipment.
polar|equipment|manufacturer: A VARCHAR(120) naming the manufacturer or brand of the equipment.
polar|equipment|servicelifeyears: A SMALLINT indicating the expected or recommended service life (in years).
polar|equipment|equipmentutilizationperc: A NUMERIC(5,2) showing the approximate utilization percentage (e.g., 75.00%).
polar|equipment|reliabilityindex: A NUMERIC(6,3) representing a reliability metric or score for the equipment.
polar|equipment|performanceindex: A NUMERIC(7,2) measuring the performance level of the equipment.
polar|equipment|efficiencyindex: A REAL value indicating the efficiency rating or ratio.
polar|equipment|safetyindex: A DECIMAL(5,3) capturing the safety rating index for the equipment.
polar|equipment|environmentalimpactindex: A DOUBLE PRECISION value denoting the environmental impact rating.
polar|location|locationregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each location record.
polar|location|loceqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking location data to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|location|timestamp: A TIMESTAMP recording when the location data was captured or logged.
polar|location|stationname: A TEXT field giving the name of the station, camp, or site.
polar|location|locationtype: An enum (LocationType_enum) describing if it is an 'Arctic' or 'Antarctic' location (e.g., Arctic, Antarctic).
polar|location|latitude: A NUMERIC(9,6) representing the latitude of the location in decimal degrees.
polar|location|longitude: A NUMERIC(9,6) representing the longitude of the location in decimal degrees.
polar|location|altitudem: A DECIMAL(7,2) specifying the altitude (in meters) above sea level.
polar|operationmaintenance|opmaintregist: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each operation/maintenance record.
polar|operationmaintenance|opmainteqref: A VARCHAR(60) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking operational data to a specific equipment unit.
polar|operationmaintenance|opmaintlocref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Location(LocationRegistry), associating this record with a location if applicable.
polar|operationmaintenance|operationhour: A NUMERIC(8,3) indicating the total hours the equipment has been in operation.
polar|operationmaintenance|maintenancecy: A NUMERIC(7,2) for the planned hours between maintenance events.
polar|operationmaintenance|lastmaintenan: A DATE noting when the last maintenance was performed.
polar|operationmaintenance|nextmaintenan: A DATE indicating the scheduled date for the next maintenance.
polar|operationmaintenance|operationalst: An enum (OperationalStatus_enum) showing the current operating state (e.g., Storage, Standby, Repair, Active, Maintenance).
polar|operationmaintenance|crewcertifica: An enum (CrewCertificationStatus_enum) indicating crew status (e.g., Valid, Pending, Expired).
polar|operationmaintenance|inspectionsta: An enum (InspectionStatus_enum) for the result of any recent inspection (e.g., Failed, Passed, Pending).
polar|operationmaintenance|compliancesta: An enum (ComplianceStatus_enum) describing overall compliance (e.g., Review, Non-compliant, Compliant).
polar|operationmaintenance|documentation: An enum (DocumentationStatus_enum) indicating if documentation is (e.g., Updated, Incomplete, Complete).
polar|operationmaintenance|opmaintcommre: An INTEGER optionally linking to a record in Communication or another table if referenced (not enforced here).
polar|powerbattery|powerbattregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each power/battery record.
polar|powerbattery|pwrbatteqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking battery data to the equipment using it.
polar|powerbattery|powerstatus: An enum (PowerStatus_enum) showing the device power state (e.g., Sleep, Charging, On, Off).
polar|powerbattery|powersource: An enum (PowerSource_enum) describing the primary energy source (e.g., Wind, Solar, Diesel, Hybrid, Battery).
polar|powerbattery|chargingstatus: An enum (ChargingStatus_enum) showing the charging state (e.g., Error, Not Charging, Charging, Full).
polar|powerbattery|powerconsumptionw: A NUMERIC(10,4) measuring the power consumption (in watts).
polar|powerbattery|energyefficiencyperce: A NUMERIC(6,3) indicating overall power or energy efficiency (e.g., 95.000%).
polar|engineandfluids|engineregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each engine/fluids record.
polar|engineandfluids|engfluidseqref: A VARCHAR(60) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking engine data to a specific equipment unit.
polar|engineandfluids|engfluidspbref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing PowerBattery(PowerBattRegistry), associating the engine with battery/power data if relevant.
polar|engineandfluids|enginespeedrpm: An INT measuring engine speed in revolutions per minute (RPM).
polar|engineandfluids|engineloadpercent: A REAL value indicating the current engine load in percentage.
polar|engineandfluids|enginetemperaturec: A DOUBLE PRECISION value measuring overall engine temperature in Celsius.
polar|engineandfluids|enginehours: A DECIMAL(8,1) recording total operational hours on the engine.
polar|engineandfluids|engfluidsopmaintre: An INTEGER optionally referencing an OperationMaintenance record if needed.
polar|transmission|transregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each transmission record.
polar|transmission|transeqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking the transmission data to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|transmission|transengfluidsref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing EngineAndFluids(EngineRegistry), associating this transmission with a particular engine/fluids record.
polar|transmission|transmissiontemperatu: A REAL value measuring the current transmission temperature in Celsius.
polar|transmission|transmissionpressurek: A DECIMAL(8,2) indicating transmission fluid pressure in kilopascals.
polar|transmission|transmissiongear: A SMALLINT representing the currently engaged gear (e.g., 3, -1, 1, 6, 0, 2, 5, 4).
polar|transmission|differentialtemperatu: A DOUBLE PRECISION value for the differential’s temperature in Celsius.
polar|transmission|axletemperaturec: A FLOAT specifying the axle’s temperature in Celsius.
polar|transmission|transopmaintref: An INTEGER optionally referencing an OperationMaintenance(OpMaintRegistry) record for linking maintenance or operational data.
polar|chassisandvehicle|chassisregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each chassis/vehicle record.
polar|chassisandvehicle|chassiseqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking chassis or vehicle details to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|chassisandvehicle|chassistransref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Transmission(TransRegistry), relating this chassis to its transmission record.
polar|chassisandvehicle|brakepadwearperc: A REAL value measuring the brake pad wear as a percentage of expected lifespan used.
polar|chassisandvehicle|brakefluidlevelp: A DECIMAL(5,2) specifying brake fluid level as a percentage.
polar|chassisandvehicle|brakepressurekpa: An INT indicating brake line pressure in kilopascals.
polar|chassisandvehicle|tracktensionkn: A NUMERIC(7,3) for tracked vehicles, indicating track tension in kilonewtons.
polar|chassisandvehicle|trackwearpercent: A FLOAT representing wear on the tracks (if applicable) as a percentage.
polar|chassisandvehicle|suspensionheight: A NUMERIC(6,1) describing the current suspension height in millimeters.
polar|chassisandvehicle|vehiclespeedkmh: A REAL number for the vehicle’s current speed in kilometers per hour.
polar|chassisandvehicle|vehicleloadkg: A DECIMAL(9,2) showing the current load (cargo + passengers) in kilograms.
polar|chassisandvehicle|vehicleangledegr: A DECIMAL(6,2) specifying the vehicle’s pitch/tilt angle in degrees.
polar|chassisandvehicle|vehicleheadingde: A NUMERIC(5,1) describing the vehicle’s heading or direction in degrees.
polar|chassisandvehicle|chassisengref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing EngineAndFluids(EngineRegistry), linking the chassis record to engine data.
polar|communication|commregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each communication record.
polar|communication|commeqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking communication data to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|communication|commlocref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Location(LocationRegistry) for associating the communication system with a location (e.g., a station).
polar|communication|radiofrequencymhz: A REAL value specifying the radio communication frequency in MHz.
polar|communication|antennastatus: An enum (AntennaStatus_enum) indicating the antenna’s operational state (e.g., Error, Normal, Warning).
polar|communication|bluetoothstatus: An enum (BluetoothStatus_enum) indicating the Bluetooth status (e.g., On, Error, Off, Pairing).
polar|communication|commopmaintref: An INTEGER optionally referencing OperationMaintenance(OpMaintRegistry) for maintenance or operational records tied to communication gear.
polar|cabinenvironment|cabinregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each cabin environment record.
polar|cabinenvironment|cabineqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking cabin environment data to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|cabinenvironment|cabinlocref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Location(LocationRegistry), associating this cabin environment with a location or station.
polar|cabinenvironment|emergencybeaconst: An enum (EmergencyBeaconStatus_enum) indicating the beacon’s mode (e.g., Active, Standby, Testing).
polar|cabinenvironment|ventilationspeedp: A DECIMAL(5,2) specifying the current ventilation speed or fan power as a percentage.
polar|cabinenvironment|heaterstatus: An enum (HeaterStatus_enum) indicating if the heater is On, Off, or in Auto mode (e.g., Off, On, Auto).
polar|cabinenvironment|heatertemperature: A DOUBLE PRECISION value denoting the set or measured heater output temperature in Celsius.
polar|cabinenvironment|defrosterstatus: An enum (DefrosterStatus_enum) describing the defroster’s state (e.g., On, Auto, Off).
polar|cabinenvironment|windowstatus: An enum (WindowStatus_enum) specifying if windows are Open, Closed, or Partial (e.g., Partial, Closed, Open).
polar|cabinenvironment|doorstatus: An enum (DoorStatus_enum) indicating if doors are Locked, Open, or Closed (e.g., Closed, Locked, Open).
polar|cabinenvironment|hatchstatus: An enum (HatchStatus_enum) describing the status of any hatches (e.g., Closed, Open, Locked).
polar|cabinenvironment|cabincommref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Communication(CommRegistry), linking the cabin environment to a communication record if relevant.
polar|lightingandsafety|lightregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each lighting and safety record.
polar|lightingandsafety|lighteqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), associating lighting/safety data with equipment.
polar|lightingandsafety|lightingstatus: An enum (LightingStatus_enum) describing the internal lighting state (e.g., Off, On, Auto).
polar|lightingandsafety|lightingintensit: A DECIMAL(5,2) showing the brightness level as a percentage.
polar|lightingandsafety|externallightsta: An enum (ExternalLightStatus_enum) indicating external lighting state (e.g., Off, On, Auto).
polar|lightingandsafety|emergencylightst: An enum (EmergencyLightStatus_enum) describing emergency lighting (e.g., On, Off, Testing).
polar|lightingandsafety|emergencystopsta: An enum (EmergencyStopStatus_enum) for the emergency stop button state (e.g., Activated, Reset, Ready).
polar|lightingandsafety|alarmstatus: An enum (AlarmStatus_enum) describing the overall alarm state (e.g., Normal, Critical, Warning).
polar|lightingandsafety|safetysystemstat: An enum (SafetySystemStatus_enum) describing the overarching safety system state (e.g., Fault, Active, Standby).
polar|lightingandsafety|lifesupportstatu: An enum (LifeSupportStatus_enum) indicating the status of life support (e.g., Warning, Critical, Normal).
polar|lightingandsafety|oxygensupplystat: An enum (OxygenSupplyStatus_enum) showing oxygen supply level (e.g., Warning, Normal, Critical).
polar|lightingandsafety|medicalequipment: An enum (MedicalEquipmentStatus_enum) describing the medical equipment state (e.g., Normal, Critical, Warning).
polar|lightingandsafety|wastemanagements: An enum (WasteManagementStatus_enum) for waste disposal system health (e.g., Critical, Warning, Normal).
polar|lightingandsafety|watersupplystatu: An enum (WaterSupplyStatus_enum) indicating water supply condition (e.g., Normal, Warning, Critical).
polar|waterandwaste|waterregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each water/waste management record.
polar|waterandwaste|watereqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), associating water/waste data with equipment.
polar|waterandwaste|waterlevelpercent: A REAL value showing the current water tank level percentage.
polar|waterandwaste|waterpressurekpa: A DECIMAL(7,2) indicating water pressure in kilopascals.
polar|waterandwaste|watertemperaturec: A FLOAT representing the water temperature in Celsius.
polar|waterandwaste|waterflowlpm: A NUMERIC(8,3) specifying water flow rate in liters per minute.
polar|waterandwaste|waterqualityindex: An INT rating or index representing overall water quality (e.g., 0–100 scale).
polar|waterandwaste|wastetanklevelpercen: A DECIMAL(5,2) measuring how full the waste tank is as a percentage of capacity.
polar|scientific|sciregistry: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each scientific record.
polar|scientific|scieqref: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking scientific data to a specific piece of equipment.
polar|scientific|scientificequipmentstat: An enum (ScientificEquipmentStatus_enum) describing the operating state of scientific instruments (e.g., Standby, Operating, Fault).
polar|scientific|dataloggingstatus: An enum (DataLoggingStatus_enum) indicating the data logging status (e.g., Active, Paused, Error).
polar|scientific|sensorstatus: An enum (SensorStatus_enum) noting sensor integrity (e.g., Error, Warning, Normal).
polar|scientific|calibrationstatus: An enum (CalibrationStatus_enum) specifying calibration validity (e.g., Expired, Valid, Due).
polar|scientific|measurementaccuracyperc: A REAL value reflecting the measurement accuracy (e.g., 98.5%).
polar|weatherandstructure|weatherregistr: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each weather and structural record.
polar|weatherandstructure|weatherlocref: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Location(LocationRegistry), tying weather data to a specific location.
polar|weatherandstructure|externaltemper: A REAL value for the external ambient temperature in Celsius.
polar|weatherandstructure|windspeedms: A FLOAT indicating wind speed in meters per second.
polar|weatherandstructure|winddirectiond: A DECIMAL(5,1) specifying the wind direction in degrees (0–359.9).
polar|weatherandstructure|barometricpres: A NUMERIC(7,2) showing atmospheric pressure in hectopascals (hPa).
polar|weatherandstructure|solarradiation: A DECIMAL(8,3) measuring solar radiation in watts per square meter.
polar|weatherandstructure|snowdepthcm: A SMALLINT for current snow depth in centimeters.
polar|weatherandstructure|icethicknesscm: A DECIMAL(5,2) representing ice thickness in centimeters.
polar|weatherandstructure|visibilitykm: A REAL value indicating visibility in kilometers.
polar|weatherandstructure|precipitationt: An enum (PrecipitationType_enum) specifying the type of precipitation (e.g., Blowing Snow, Ice, Snow).
polar|weatherandstructure|precipitationr: A DECIMAL(7,3) measuring precipitation rate in millimeters per hour.
polar|weatherandstructure|snowloadkgm2: An INT indicating the snow load on structures in kg/m².
polar|weatherandstructure|structuralload: A REAL showing structural load as a percentage of maximum capacity.
polar|weatherandstructure|structuralinte: An enum (StructuralIntegrityStatus_enum) describing the building/structure condition (e.g., Warning, Critical, Normal).
polar|weatherandstructure|vibrationlevel: A FLOAT recording vibration level in mm/s².
polar|weatherandstructure|noiseleveldb: A DECIMAL(7,2) specifying noise level in decibels (dB).
polar|weatherandstructure|weatheropmaint: An INTEGER foreign key referencing OperationMaintenance(OpMaintRegistry), linking weather/structural data to operation/maintenance records if needed.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|thermalreg: A SERIAL primary key uniquely identifying each thermal/solar/wind/grid record.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|thermaleqr: A VARCHAR(70) foreign key referencing Equipment(EquipmentCode), linking this record to a piece of equipment that manages thermal or power generation.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|thermalcom: An INTEGER foreign key referencing Communication(CommRegistry), relating thermal/power data to communication info if relevant.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|thermalima: An enum (ThermalImagingStatus_enum) describing thermal imaging system health (e.g., Warning, Critical, Normal).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|insulation: An enum (InsulationStatus_enum) indicating insulation quality (e.g., Fair, Poor, Good).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|heatlossra: A DECIMAL(8,3) measuring the heat loss rate in kilowatt-hours (kWh) per some reference time.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|solarpanel: An enum (SolarPanelStatus_enum) describing the solar panel status (e.g., Fault, Inactive, Active).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|windturbin: An enum (WindTurbineStatus_enum) indicating turbine operation state (e.g., Fault, Operating, Stopped).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|powergrids: An enum (PowerGridStatus_enum) describing grid connection state (e.g., Connected, Disconnected, Island Mode).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|powerquali: A DECIMAL(5,2) capturing power quality or stability (e.g., 95.50).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|backuppowe: An enum (BackupPowerStatus_enum) for backup power system health (e.g., Fault, Active, Standby).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|fuelcellst: An enum (FuelCellStatus_enum) indicating the fuel cell’s operating state (e.g., Standby, Fault, Operating).
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|fuelcellou: A DOUBLE PRECISION value denoting power output (in watts) from the fuel cell.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|fuelcellef: A DECIMAL(4,1) describing the fuel cell’s efficiency as a percentage.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|hydrogenle: A DECIMAL(5,2) measuring the hydrogen supply level as a percentage of capacity.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|oxygenleve: A DECIMAL(5,2) indicating the oxygen supply level as a percentage of capacity.
polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|thermalpow: An INTEGER foreign key referencing PowerBattery(PowerBattRegistry), connecting thermal/power generation data to battery/power details.

polar|cabinenvironment|cabinclimate.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates environmental metrics for the cabin, including temperature, humidity, pressure, and air quality indicators.

fields_meaning.temperature_c: A REAL value representing the cabin’s internal temperature in Celsius.
fields_meaning.humidity_percent: A DECIMAL(4,1) measuring the relative humidity in the cabin as a percentage.
fields_meaning.pressure_kpa: An INT specifying the internal cabin pressure in kilopascals.
fields_meaning.co2_ppm: A DECIMAL(7,1) describing the CO₂ concentration in parts per million (ppm).
fields_meaning.o2_percent: A NUMERIC(5,2) indicating the oxygen percentage inside the cabin.
fields_meaning.air_quality_index: A REAL value summarizing the cabin air quality (e.g., 0–500 index).

polar|chassisandvehicle|tiremetrics.column_meaning: JSONB column. Captures tire-related data, including pressure, temperature, and tread condition.

fields_meaning.pressure_kpa: A SMALLINT for the tires’ pressure in kilopascals.
fields_meaning.temperature_c: A DOUBLE PRECISION value representing the tires’ temperature in Celsius.
fields_meaning.tread_depth_mm: A DECIMAL(6,2) showing the depth of the tire tread in millimeters.

polar|communication|signalmetrics.column_meaning: JSONB column. Combines signal strength and performance metrics for various communication systems.

fields_meaning.gps_strength: An enum (GPSSignalStrength_enum) for GPS signal quality (e.g., Strong, Weak, Medium).
fields_meaning.satellite_status: An enum (SatelliteConnectionStatus_enum) specifying the satellite connection state (e.g., Limited, Connected, Disconnected).
fields_meaning.radio_strength_dbm: A DECIMAL(7,3) measuring radio signal strength in dBm.
fields_meaning.wifi_strength_dbm: A FLOAT specifying the WiFi signal strength in dBm.
fields_meaning.latency_ms: A NUMERIC(6,2) for the measured network latency in milliseconds.
fields_meaning.data_rate_kbps: A DOUBLE PRECISION value showing the data transmission rate in kilobits per second.

polar|engineandfluids|fluidmetrics.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups fluid-related metrics for fuel, oil, coolant, and hydraulic systems, including levels, pressures, and temperatures.

fuel.level_percent: A REAL value specifying the current fuel tank level percentage.
fuel.consumption_lh: A DECIMAL(5,2) representing fuel consumption in liters per hour.
fuel.pressure_kpa: A SMALLINT measuring the fuel pressure in kilopascals.
fuel.temperature_c: A FLOAT for the current fuel temperature in Celsius.

oil.level_percent: A REAL value for the oil level percentage.
oil.pressure_kpa: An INT indicating the oil pressure in kilopascals.
oil.temperature_c: A DOUBLE PRECISION value measuring the engine oil temperature in Celsius.

coolant.level_percent: A DECIMAL(5,2) for the coolant level percentage in the system.
coolant.temperature_c: A REAL number denoting the coolant temperature in Celsius.
coolant.pressure_kpa: An INT for the coolant pressure in kilopascals.

hydraulic.pressure_kpa: A DECIMAL(7,3) specifying the hydraulic system pressure in kilopascals.
hydraulic.temperature_c: A FLOAT for the hydraulic fluid temperature in Celsius.
hydraulic.level_percent: A DECIMAL(5,2) indicating the hydraulic fluid level as a percentage.

polar|lightingandsafety|safetysensors.column_meaning: JSONB column. Collects status data for safety-related detection systems, such as fire, smoke, and gas sensors.

fields_meaning.fire_detection: An enum (FireDetectionStatus_enum) specifying the fire detection system status (e.g., Normal, Alert, Fault).
fields_meaning.smoke_detection: An enum (SmokeDetectionStatus_enum) for the smoke detection system status (e.g., Fault, Alert, Normal).
fields_meaning.co_detection: An enum (CODetectionStatus_enum) indicating the carbon monoxide detection status (e.g., Fault, Alert, Normal).
fields_meaning.gas_detection: An enum (GasDetectionStatus_enum) describing the presence of gas detection alerts (e.g., Alert, Fault, Normal).

polar|operationmaintenance|costmetrics.column_meaning: JSONB column. Aggregates financial metrics related to maintenance, repair, and operating costs.

fields_meaning.maintenance_usd: A DECIMAL(8,2) for the cost (in USD) of recent or typical maintenance.
fields_meaning.repair_usd: A DECIMAL(9,3) for the cost (in USD) of repairs, if any.
fields_meaning.operating_usd: A NUMERIC(9,4) indicating the ongoing operating cost (in USD).

polar|powerbattery|batterystatus.column_meaning: JSONB column. Combines metrics describing battery performance, health, and charging status.

fields_meaning.level_percent: A NUMERIC(5,2) representing the current battery level percentage.
fields_meaning.health_percent: A NUMERIC(4,1) indicating the battery’s health status in percentage (e.g., 90.0%).
fields_meaning.cycles: A SMALLINT counting the number of charge/discharge cycles for the battery.
fields_meaning.temperature_c: A DOUBLE PRECISION value measuring the battery’s temperature in Celsius.
fields_meaning.current_a: A NUMERIC(7,3) specifying the current (in amperes) used during charging.
fields_meaning.voltage_v: A NUMERIC(5,2) specifying the voltage (in volts) used during charging.

polar|thermalsolarwindandgrid|renewablem.column_meaning: JSONB column. Groups performance data for renewable energy sources, including solar panels and wind turbines.

solar.output_w: A NUMERIC(9,2) specifying current solar panel output in watts.
solar.efficiency_percent: A DECIMAL(5,2) showing the efficiency of the solar panel as a percentage.
solar.temperature_c: A FLOAT for the solar panel’s temperature in Celsius.

wind.output_w: A REAL value measuring the turbine’s power output in watts.
wind.rpm: A SMALLINT specifying the wind turbine’s rotational speed in RPM.
